subject: Validation Result: MELO v2 Registration Tasks Batch

findings.notes: Registration flow fully implemented. useMatrixAuth integration complete, form validation with Zod, all required fields present. Build successful.
Username conflict error handling fully implemented. Error state management, UI feedback with red styling, form submission prevention when conflicts detected.

Mobile responsiveness confirmed by evidence (mobile screenshot successful) but limited responsive CSS classes found. Functional at 375x667 viewport but could benefit from more explicit responsive design patterns.

content.summary: MELO registration tasks: 2 PASS, 1 CONDITIONAL PASS. Core functionality complete, mobile rendering functional.
